about.title: Ve ReviewCompany
about.subtitle: Nen tang danh gia cong ty uy tin va minh bach
about.whoWeAreP1: ReviewCompany la nen tang danh gia cong ty hang dau, giup nguoi tim viec va nhan vien chia se trai nghiem thuc te ve moi truong lam viec, van hoa cong ty, va cac khia canh khac cua cong viec.
about.whoWeAreP2: Muc tieu cua chung toi la tao ra mot cong dong minh bach, noi moi nguoi co the dua ra quyet dinh nghe nghiep sang suot dua tren thong tin thuc te tu nhung nguoi da tung lam viec tai cac cong ty.
about.missionIntro: Chung toi tin rang moi nguoi deu xung dang co thong tin day du ve noi ho se lam viec. Bang cach ket noi nguoi tim viec voi nhung trai nghiem thuc te, chung toi giup:
about.missionList1: Nguoi tim viec dua ra quyet dinh nghe nghiep sang suot
about.missionList2: Cong ty cai thien moi truong lam viec dua tren phan hoi thuc te
about.missionList3: Tao ra mot thi truong lao dong minh bach va cong bang hon
about.featureReviewDesc: Xem va danh gia cac cong ty dua tren nhieu tieu chi khac nhau
about.featureCommentDesc: Thao luan va chia se kinh nghiem voi cong dong
about.featureSearchDesc: Tim kiem cong ty theo ten, dia diem, hoac tu khoa
about.featureRankingDesc: Xem top cac cong ty duoc danh gia cao nhat

faq.title: Cau hoi thuong gap
faq.subtitle: Nhung cau hoi thuong gap ve ReviewCompany
faq.a1: ReviewCompany la nen tang cho phep nguoi lao dong chia se danh gia ve moi truong lam viec, van hoa cong ty, va trai nghiem lam viec tai cac cong ty Viet Nam.
faq.q2: Lam sao de viet danh gia?
faq.a2: Ban can dang ky tai khoan, tim cong ty muon danh gia, va dien vao form danh gia. Danh gia se duoc duyet truoc khi dang cong khai.
faq.q3: Danh gia co an danh khong?
faq.a3: Co, ban co the chon danh gia an danh. Thong tin ca nhan cua ban se duoc bao mat va chi hien thi 'Nguoi dung an danh'.
faq.q4: Lam sao de biet danh gia la that?
faq.a4: Moi danh gia deu duoc doi ngu kiem duyet xac minh. Chung toi su dung nhieu phuong phap de dam bao tinh xac thuc cua danh gia.
faq.q5: Toi co the chinh sua danh gia da dang khong?
faq.a5: Co, ban co the chinh sua hoac xoa danh gia cua minh bat cu luc nao trong phan Ho so ca nhan.
faq.q6: Cong ty co the xoa danh gia xau khong?
faq.a6: Khong, cong ty khong the xoa hoac chinh sua danh gia. Chi khi danh gia vi pham chinh sach thi moi bi go bo.
faq.q7: Lam sao de them cong ty moi?
faq.a7: Neu cong ty ban muon danh gia chua co trong he thong, ban co the yeu cau them cong ty moi khi dang nhap.
faq.q8: Lien he ho tro nhu the nao?
faq.a8: Ban co the lien he chung toi qua email support@reviewcompany.vn hoac qua form lien he tren website.
faq.notFound: Khong tim thay cau tra loi?
faq.notFoundDesc: Neu ban co cau hoi khac, vui long lien he voi chung toi:

contact.title: Lien he voi chung toi
contact.subtitle: Chung toi luon san sang lang nghe y kien cua ban
contact.messageSent: Tin nhan cua ban da duoc gui thanh cong. Chung toi se phan hoi trong vong 24 gio.
contact.subject: Chu de
contact.errorMessage: Co loi xay ra. Vui long thu lai.

terms.title: Dieu khoan su dung
terms.section1Text: Khi su dung ReviewCompany, ban dong y tuan thu cac dieu khoan nay. Neu khong dong y, vui long khong su dung dich vu.
terms.section2Text: Ban chiu trach nhiem bao mat thong tin dang nhap. Moi hoat dong tu tai khoan deu thuoc trach nhiem cua ban.
terms.section3Text: Ban cam ket dang noi dung trung thuc, khong vi pham phap luat, khong xuc pham hoac boi nho nguoi khac.
terms.section4Text: Moi noi dung ban dang van thuoc quyen so huu cua ban. Tuy nhien, ban cho phep ReviewCompany su dung de hien thi tren nen tang.
terms.section5Text: ReviewCompany khong chiu trach nhiem ve tinh chinh xac cua cac danh gia. Nguoi dung tu chiu trach nhiem ve quyet dinh cua minh.
terms.section6Text: Chung toi co quyen thay doi dieu khoan bat cu luc nao. Thay doi se duoc thong bao tren website.

privacy.title: Chinh sach bao mat
privacy.section1Title: 1. Thong tin chung toi thu thap
privacy.section1Text: Chung toi thu thap thong tin ban cung cap khi dang ky tai khoan, viet danh gia, hoac lien he voi chung toi.
privacy.section2Text: Thong tin duoc su dung de cung cap dich vu, cai thien trai nghiem nguoi dung, va lien lac khi can thiet.
privacy.section3Text: Chung toi ap dung cac bien phap bao mat de bao ve thong tin ca nhan cua ban khoi truy cap trai phep.
privacy.section4Text: Chung toi khong ban hoac chia se thong tin ca nhan cua ban voi ben thu ba, tru khi co su dong y cua ban hoac theo yeu cau phap luat.
privacy.section5Text: Website su dung cookie de cai thien trai nghiem su dung. Ban co the tat cookie trong trinh duyet neu muon.
privacy.section6Text: Ban co quyen truy cap, chinh sua, hoac xoa thong tin ca nhan cua minh bat cu luc nao.

guidelines.title: Huong dan viet danh gia
guidelines.subtitle: Huong dan giup ban viet danh gia huu ich cho cong dong
guidelines.do1: Viet danh gia trung thuc dua tren trai nghiem that su cua ban
guidelines.do2: Neu cu the cac vi du ve moi truong lam viec, van hoa cong ty
guidelines.do3: Can bang giua uu diem va nhuoc diem
guidelines.do4: Chia se loi khuyen co ich cho nguoi tim viec
guidelines.do5: Giu ngon tu lich su, chuyen nghiep
guidelines.dont1: Dang thong tin ca nhan cua dong nghiep hoac quan ly
guidelines.dont2: Su dung ngon tu xuc pham, boi nho
guidelines.dont3: Dang noi dung khong lien quan den cong viec
guidelines.dont4: Viet danh gia gia hoac tu cong ty khac
guidelines.dont5: Dang thong tin mat cua cong ty
guidelines.tip1: Mo ta cu the thoi gian ban lam viec tai cong ty
guidelines.tip2: Neu ro vi tri cong viec cua ban (neu thoai mai)
guidelines.tip3: Chia se ca trai nghiem tot va chua tot
guidelines.tip4: Dua ra diem so cong bang, phan anh dung trai nghiem
guidelines.tip5: Cap nhat danh gia khi co thay doi dang ke
